add_wallet.title: Add another wallet
add_wallet.create_wallet_description: Create a new wallet on one of your seed phrases.
add_wallet.import_wallet: Import with a Secret Recovery Phrase or Private Key
add_wallet.import_wallet_description: Add a wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key.
add_wallet.hardware_wallet_description: Add more accounts from your Bluetooth hardware wallet.
add_wallet.watch_address_description: Watch a public address or ENS name.

remove_wallet_prompt.hide_description: This only removes the wallet from this list. You can find this wallet and additional management options in settings.
remove_wallet_prompt.remove_description: This will remove the wallet from this list and delete all data associated with it.

settings.title: Settings
settings.default_wallet_description: Allow Apps to prioritize Rainbow when looking for an extension to connect with.

privacy_and_security.title: Privacy & Security
privacy_and_security.analytics_description: Help Rainbow improve its products and services by allowing analytics of usage data. Collected data is not associated with you or your account.
privacy_and_security.hide_asset_balances_description: With this turned on Rainbow will obfuscate token balances accross the app.

confirm_password.title: Enter your Password
confirm_password.description: You need to enter your current password to continue.

private_key.title: Your Private Key
private_key.subtitle: Anyone who has this key can access your entire wallet! You should never share it.
private_key.warning_1: Never share your Private Key or enter it into any apps.
private_key.warning_2: Make sure nobody can view your screen when viewing your Private Key.
private_key.warning_3: Anyone with your Private Key can access your entire wallet.
private_key.warning_4: Rainbow Support will never ask you for your Private Key.

recovery_phrase.title: Your Recovery Phrase
recovery_phrase.subtitle: Anyone who has these words can access your entire wallet! You should never share them.
recovery_phrase.warning_1: Never share your Recovery Phrase or enter it into any apps.
recovery_phrase.warning_2: Make sure nobody can view your screen when viewing your Recovery Phrase.
recovery_phrase.warning_3: Anyone with your Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet.
recovery_phrase.warning_4: Rainbow Support will never ask you for your Recovery Phrase.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.flashbots_description: Flashbots protects your transactions and reduces the likelihood of transaction failures. Learn more.

feature_flags.full_watching_wallets: Allow full access to watching wallets

connected_apps.title: Connected Apps
connected_apps.no_connections_copy: Websites you connect to will show up here

review.title: Review & Send
review.sending_on_l2_check_1: I’m not sending to an exchange
review.sending_on_l2_check_2: The person I’m sending to has a wallet that support %{chainName}

tokens_input.nothing_found_description: Some tokens don’t have enough liquidity to perform a successful swap.
tokens_input.nothing_found_description_l2: Some tokens don’t have enough layer 2 liquidity to perform a successful swap.

slippage.title: Slippage
slippage.description_1: Slippage occurs when the price of a swap changes during the time between you submitting your transaction and its confirmation.
slippage.description_2: Setting a higher slippage tolerance increases the likelihood your swap will be successful, but may result in you getting a worse price.

read_more.close_text: about slippage and how it affects swaps.

flashbots.title: Flashbots
flashbots.description: Flashbots protects your transactions from frontrunning and sandwich attacks which might result in you getting a worse price or your transaction failing.

read_more.close_text: about Flashbots and the protection it offers.

routing.title: Swap Routing
routing.description: By default, Rainbow chooses the cheapest route possible for your swap. If you prefer to specifically use either 0x or 1inch, you can do that too.

read_more.close_text: about our approach to routing swaps.

long_wait.title: Long wait to swap
long_wait.description: This swap may take a very long time to complete. This is usually due to problems with a cross-chain bridge.

no_route.title: No routes found
no_route.description: We couldn’t find a route for this swap. A route may not exist for this swap, or the amount may be too small.

no_quote.title: No quote available
no_quote.description: We couldn’t find quotes for this swap. This could be because there isn’t enough liqudity to swap or because of problems with how the  token is implemented.

insufficient_liquidity.title: Insufficient liquidity
insufficient_liquidity.description: We couldn’t find quotes for this swap because this pair doesn’t have enough liquidity on exchanges.

contacts.remove_contact_description: Are you sure you want to remove “%{name}” from your contacts?

unlock.enter_password: Enter your password to unlock Rainbow.

onboard_before_connect.almost_done: You’re almost done. Quickly finish setting up your wallet with Rainbow.

welcome.title: Rainbow
welcome.subtitle: Explore the new world of Ethereum
welcome.disclaimer_tos: By proceeding, you agree to Rainbow’s

seed_backup_prompt.title: Before you get started, backup your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_backup_prompt.warning_1: It's important to write down and store your Secret Recovery Phrase somewhere safe.
seed_backup_prompt.warning_2: Your Secret Recovery Phrase is the only way to recover your accounts and funds.
seed_backup_prompt.warning_3: Anyone with your Secret Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet.

seed_reveal.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_reveal.write_down_seed_importance: Store these words can access your entire wallet! Store them somewhere safe never share them.

import_or_connect.title: Import or Connect
import_or_connect.explanation: Store these words can access your entire wallet! Store them somewhere safe never share them.
import_or_connect.import_wallet: Import with a Secret Recovery Phrase or Private Key
import_or_connect.import_wallet_description: Add a wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key.
import_or_connect.connect_wallet_description: Add accounts from your hardware wallet
import_or_connect.watch_address_description: Watch a public address or ENS name

import_wallet_selection.title: Your wallets
import_wallet_selection.description_plural: Rainbow detected %{count} wallets that have been used recently. You can edit or add more at any time.
import_wallet_selection.description_singular: Rainbow detected 1 wallet that have been used recently. You can add more at any time.
import_wallet_selection.loading: Hold tight while we look up all your wallets...

watch_wallet.title: Watch an Ethereum address
watch_wallet.description: Enter any Ethereum address or ENS name. You'll have to import it later to send or sign transactions.
watch_wallet.loading: Hold tight while we start watching these wallets...

import_wallet.title: Import your wallet
import_wallet.description: Enter your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key from Rainbow or any Ethereum wallet.
import_wallet.placeholder: Paste your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key from another wallet

seed_verify.title: Verify your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_verify.explanation: Select the 4th, 8th, and 12th words in order your  Secret Recovery Phrase displays them.

approve_request.wallet_info_title: wants to connect to your wallet
approve_request.wallet_info_description: Allow %{appName} to view your wallets address, balance, activity and request approval for transactions.

passwords.try_another_password_weak: This is a weak password that is easy to crack. Try a stronger password.
passwords.try_another_password_common: This is a common password that is easy to crack. Try a stronger password.
passwords.too_short: Password needs to be at least 8 chars long

create_password.title: Create your password
create_password.description: Choose a password to secure & lock your wallet.

activity.empty_description: Once you start using your wallet, you will see your transactions here.

speed_up_and_cancel.cancel_explanation: This will attempt to cancel your pending transaction. It requires broadcasting another transaction.
speed_up_and_cancel.speed_up_explanation: This will speed up your pending transaction by replacing it. There's a chance your original transaction will confirm first.

wallet_ready.title: Your wallets ready
wallet_ready.get_started_with_rainbow_desc: Welcome to Rainbow! We're so glad you're here. We’ve created this guide to help with the basics of Rainbow.
wallet_ready.discover_shortcuts_desc: Welcome to Rainbow! We're so glad you're here. We’ve created this guide to help with the basics of Rainbow and get you started on your new We...

to_smart_contract.description_1: The address you entered is for a smart contract.
to_smart_contract.description_2: Except for rare situations, you probably shouldn't do this. You could lose your assets or they might go to the wrong place.
to_smart_contract.description_3: Double check the address, verify it with the recipient, or contact support first.
to_smart_contract.title: Hold your horses!

sending_on_l2.arbitrum_description_1: Arbitrum is a Layer 2 network that runs on top of Ethereum, enabling cheaper and faster transactions while still benefiting from the underlying security of Ethereum.
sending_on_l2.arbitrum_description_2: It bundles lots of transactions together in a "roll up" before sending them down to live permanently on Ethereum.
sending_on_l2.optimism_description_1: Optimism is a Layer 2 network that runs on top of Ethereum, enabling cheaper and faster transactions while still benefiting from the underlying security of Ethereum.
sending_on_l2.optimism_description_2: It bundles lots of transactions together in a "roll up" before sending them down to live permanently on Ethereum.
sending_on_l2.polygon_description_1: Polygon is a sidechain, a distinct network that runs alongside Ethereum and is compatible with it.
sending_on_l2.polygon_description_2: It allows for cheaper and faster transactions, but unlike Layer 2 networks, Polygon has its own security and consensus mechanisms that differ from Ethereum.
sending_on_l2.bsc_description_1: Binance Smart Chain, or BSC for short, is the blockchain network for the  trading platform Binance.
sending_on_l2.bsc_description_2: It allows for cheaper and faster transactions, but unlike Layer 2 networks, BSC has its own security and consensus mechanisms that differ from Ethereum.

custom_gas.current_base_stable: Network traffic is stable right now. Have fun!
custom_gas.current_base_surging: Fees are unusually high right now! Unless your transaction is urgent, it’s best to wait for fees to drop.
custom_gas.current_base_rising: Fees are rising right now! It’s best to use a higher max base fee to avoid a stuck transaction.
custom_gas.current_base_description: The base fee is set by the Ethereum network and changes depending on how busy the network is.
custom_gas.max_base_explainer_1: This is the maximum base fee you’re willing to pay for this transaction.
custom_gas.max_base_explainer_2: Setting a higher max base fee prevents your transaction from getting stuck if fees rise.
custom_gas.max_priority_explainer:
The miner tip goes directly to the miner who confirms your transaction on the network.

A higher tip makes your transaction more likely to be confirmed quickly.

flashbots.title: Flashbots
flashbots.description: Flashbots protects your transactions from frontrunning and sandwich attacks which might result in you getting a worse price or your transaction failing.

fee.title: Rainbow Fee
fee.description: Rainbow takes a %{feePercentage} fee from swaps. It’s part of what enables us to give you the best Ethereum experience possible.

alert.wallet_watching_mode: This wallet is currently in 'Watching' mode
